title: Sketches from Paintings by Claude: (1) ‘Landscape with David and the Three Heroes’; (2) ‘Landscape with Christ Appearing to Mary Magdalen’; (3) ‘Landscape with Philip Baptising the Eunuch’; (4) ‘Parnassus’; (5) ‘Landscape with Hagar and the Angel’
credits: Accepted by the nation as part of the Turner Bequest 1856
